### Solution {.tabset}

#### R
```{r}
library(mvtnorm)
y.obs.indep <- cbind(rnorm(1000, mean=3, sd=2),
                     rnorm(1000, mean=8, sd=5))
Sigma.dep <- matrix(c(4,8,8,25), nrow=2, ncol=2)
y.obs.dep <- rmvnorm(1000, mean=c(3,8), sigma=Sigma.dep)

```

#### Julia
```{julia, results = 'hide'}
using Distributions

mean = [3, 8]
Sigma_indep = [2 0;0 5]
Sigma_dep = [4 8; 8 25]

Y_obs_indep = MvNormal(mean, Sigma_indep)
Y_indep_sample = rand(Y_obs_indep, 1000)

Y_obs_dep = MvNormal(mean, Sigma_dep)
Y_dep_sample = rand(Y_obs_dep, 1000)

```
